trial_type.Description: Trial component and associated stimulus type presented

Levels.quest_mark: Start of trial, a question mark presentation requiring a response / decision. In HCP, task is rigged.
Levels.filler: A filler if response is quicker than 1500ms (presented as fixation)
Levels.feedback: An event indicating feedback following decision
Levels.isi_1sec: An inter-stimulus interval event lasting ~one second.
Levels.full_gamble: Full gamble window from start of question to end of feedback

reward_type.Description: Indicates whether the event is a reward or punishment.

Levels.Reward: Gaining of money, indicated by up green arrow with amount.
Levels.Punishment: Loss of money, indicated by down red arrow with amount.
Levels.Neutral: Non-monetary event, indicated by double grey arrow.

feedback_type.Description: Events related to feedback following a task. Includes both positive and negative feedback.

block.Description: The block of trials to which the event belongs.

mostly_reward.Description: Indicating whether block was mostly reward trials >50%.

mostly_loss.Description: Indicating whether block was mostly loss trials >50%.
